comments:
3.3 M7

Went to launch my target by clicking the Debug toolbar item.
Got an error dialog: An internal error occurred during: "Compute launch button tooltip".
log had:

java.util.ConcurrentModificationException: concurrent access to HashMap attempted by Thread[Worker-207,5,main]
at java.util.HashMap.onEntry(HashMap.java:213)
at java.util.HashMap.transfer(HashMap.java:632)
at java.util.HashMap.resize(HashMap.java:622)
at java.util.HashMap.addEntry(HashMap.java:994)
at java.util.HashMap.put(HashMap.java:510)
at org.eclipse.debug.internal.core.LaunchManager.getInfo(LaunchManager.java:1285)
at org.eclipse.debug.internal.core.LaunchConfiguration.getInfo(LaunchConfiguration.java:394)
at org.eclipse.debug.internal.core.LaunchConfiguration.getType(LaunchConfiguration.java:530)
at org.eclipse.debug.internal.core.LaunchManager.isValid(LaunchManager.java:1965)
at org.eclipse.debug.internal.core.LaunchManager.verifyConfigurations(LaunchManager.java:2339)
at org.eclipse.debug.internal.core.LaunchManager.getAllLaunchConfigurations(LaunchManager.java:1057)
at org.eclipse.debug.internal.core.LaunchManager.getLaunchConfigurations(LaunchManager.java:1332)
at org.eclipse.debug.internal.ui.launchConfigurations.LaunchConfigurationManager.getApplicableLaunchConfigurations(LaunchConfigurationManager.java:727)
at org.eclipse.debug.internal.ui.contextlaunching.LaunchingResourceManager.getResourceLabel(LaunchingResourceManager.java:272)
at org.eclipse.debug.internal.ui.contextlaunching.LaunchingResourceManager.computeLabels(LaunchingResourceManager.java:194)
at org.eclipse.debug.internal.ui.contextlaunching.LaunchingResourceManager$2.run(LaunchingResourceManager.java:120)
at org.eclipse.core.internal.jobs.Worker.run(Worker.java:55)

Created an attachment (id=74022)
proposed fix

There were two cases where we were adding to and removing from the map of launch configurations in the launch manager without any synchronization. This patch provides synchronization for those cases.

needs more testing.

Created an attachment (id=74024)
better fix

the sync'ing should be on the 'this' object, so we get the proper synchronization with methods that iterate over the collection of launch configurations.

applied patch to HEAD and 3.3.1

see LaunchManager#getInfo and LaunchManager#launchConfigurationChanged

marking as 3.3.1 candidate

I'm using Version: 3.3.1.1 Build id: M20071023-1652 on an AMD Turion64X2 machine running the latest Ubuntu OS.

I am receiving this very same error.

Compute launch button tooltip... assertion failed...

"An internal error occurred during "Compute launch button tooltip
assertion failed: Path for IClassPathEntry must be absolute"

pops up frequently and is a nuisance and distraction.
